original_text: In that day the root of Jesse, who shall stand as a signal for the peoples—of him shall the nations inquire, and his resting place shall be glorious.
korean_text: 그 날에 이새의 뿌리에서 한 싹이 나서 만민의 기치로 설 것이요 열방이 그에게로 돌아오리니 그가 거한 곳이 영화로우리라

sentences.original_text: who shall stand as a signal for the peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 민족들을 위한 표징이 될 것인데

sentences.original_text: of him shall the nations inquire
and his resting place shall be glorious
